title: Everything Diving by SSI
creator: SSI Scuba Schools International - C. Krzywicki

extendedInfo.description: Everything Diving by SSIEverything Diving is the new App from Scuba Schools International. Free, easy to install, intuitive and with everything a diver needs at home and while travelling.Contents are:- All SSI certifications "In Your Pocket" . Show what you can can do, directly on your mobile device- Important check lists on scuba diving. Dive planner, equipment, travel or first aid, here you check step by step if all is in good order- important hand signals for divers- SSI dive tables for Air and Nitrox for reference and planning- Flow charts for First Aid and Neuro Check. For immediate help when you need it- SSI - Partner search, around you and world wide. Find all SSI partners world wide, including a complete description of their local services...and much more for your "Ultimate Dive Experience"SSI has offered free Online Diver Verification for years - now you can synchronize your electronic C-Card with your new SSI App and carry it with you. For this individual service, you just need to log on to your free "mySSI" user account at www.divessi.com and you will have all functions at your finger tips. "The Ultimate Dive Experience" powered by SSI.Since more than 40 years SSI provides training, scuba diving certification, and educational resources for divers, dive instructors, and dive centers and resorts around the world. Started in 1970, SSI has expanded to include more than 30 Service Centers, is represented in more than 110 countries with over 2.400 International locations and has materials printed in more than 25 languages.

reviews.title: Nice app,but..
reviews.comment: Good app,but it can be awesome if add dive log and map feture. So another diver can see another dive spot in the world..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot even launch it
reviews.comment: I have a google nexus with stock android 4.2.2. The app crashes on launch,...
reviews.author: Alessandro Zanarini

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: My only comment is that I wish I had the ability to keep a digital log book as well.
reviews.author: Josh Daily

reviews.title: Great APP
reviews.comment: Had a little trouble at first. C cards would not load. Sent a message in help center and they responded right away and had the problem fixed in an hour. They were very helpful and courteous.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Needs dive log and air consumption calculator. And a map to pin point spots
reviews.author: Jason Helmly

reviews.title: Almost there
reviews.comment: Add in dive log feature, and this is a five star app for sure
reviews.author: Aaron Oaks

reviews.title: Crashes on start
reviews.comment: Reinstalled, rebooted, always errors on start. Splash screen, loading data... Unfortunately, blah has stopped.  Edit: using WiFi worked.

reviews.title: Great app, excellent support from devs
reviews.comment: Awesome app, very useful - now I don\'t need to carry my c-card with me. I also had an issue initially downloading my c-card, but after contacting the support they fixed it very quickly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An error has occured
reviews.comment: Can\'t look at cards from my phone. States only \" an error has occurred \".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Had an issue with finding my cards and downloading them. I sent an email to tech support in under 8hrs I received a reply and it was fixed.  Overall the app works well and is a must have to anyone that is SSI certified.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sundivr
reviews.comment: Tried to look up my instructor card from the mid 90s and all I got was an error or that it was going back into the archives for pre 2007.

reviews.title: Nice start
reviews.comment: Looks nice, get an error when logging in so no C-card...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems the bugs are gone !!!
reviews.comment: As for all new Apps, A few bugs will be seen from time to time. I have it loaded on 2 phones and both are working welll. Great for all divers just not SSI Divers .. Loads of information can be found here
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Pros: great app very informative and easy to handle. The check feature is great and so the e-cards Cons: it does not work well on htc one x it exits the app when I\'m pressing the return button. Another thing it could use a decompression calculator instead of or alongside the tables Bottom line: very recommended
reviews.author: A Google User
